agoraphobic.Name: Agoraphobic
agoraphobic.Effect: You avoid open spaces and crowds.

addled.Name: Addled
addled.Effect: Your memories are jumbled and confused.

amnesia.Name: Amnesia
amnesia.Effect: You've lost a large swath of memory.

broken.Name: Broken
broken.Effect: Your will is broken and you back down from everything.

captivated.Name: Captivated
captivated.Effect: You're heavily preoccupied with something and can't split your attention.

cowed.Name: Cowed
cowed.Effect: Someone has weakened you through a display of dominance.

detached.Name: Detached
detached.Effect: You've run with occult circles for so long you've forgotten how to interact with humans.

deprived.Name: Deprived
P:
deprived.Effect: You're weakened by an unfed addiction.

disoriented.Name: Disoriented
disoriented.Effect: You've lost equilibrium and need an opportunity to recenter.

dissociation.Name: Dissociation
dissociation.Effect: Surreality plagues you with doubts of your own experiences.

distracted.Name: Distracted
distracted.Effect: You're buffeted from all sides, splitting your attention terribly.

doubtful.Name: Doubtful
doubtful.Effect: You've lost confidence in all but your most secure actions.

emboldened.Name: Emboldened
emboldened.Effect: An uninhibited atmosphere makes you impulsive and prone to temptation.

faith.Name: Faith
faith.Effect: Your trust in the next world can be exploited by angelic forces.

frightened.Name: Frightened
frightened.Effect: You're terrified and moved to panic and flee.

fugue.Name: Fugue
fugue.Effect: You've shied away from trauma by shutting out the experience.

guilty.Name: Guilty
guilty.Effect: Feelings of remorse leave you emotionally vulnerable.

informed.Name: Informed
informed.Effect: You're well equipped to tackle a given subject.

inspired.Name: Inspired
inspired.Effect: The spirit moves you to confident action.

lost.Name: Lost
lost.Effect: You've lost your sense of place and need to reorient.

lost_tracker.Name: Lost Tracker
lost_tracker.Effect: Frustrations on a hunt leave your tracking skills sloppy and halfhearted.

madness.Name: Madness
madness.Effect: Unnatural horror has shattered your ability to process life.

obsession.Name: Obsession
P:
obsession.Effect: Something controls your attention and distracts from all else.

shaken.Name: Shaken
shaken.Effect: You're shocked or deeply rattled, unsteadying your hand.

sleepwalking.Name: Sleepwalking
sleepwalking.Effect: Sleep and wakefulness blur, and you suffer from lost time and poor recollection.

steadfast.Name: Steadfast
steadfast.Effect: Your resolve to act is steeled and ready.

stoic.Name: Stoic
stoic.Effect: Distance and emotional guard ease lies, but inhibit perspective and passion.

strained.Name: Strained
strained.Effect: You've held back the shock of witnessing supernal sorcery, but the pressure remains.

swooned.Name: Swooned
swooned.Effect: You're charmed or bedazzled by a particular person.

withdrawn.Name: Withdrawn
withdrawn.Effect: Doubt and insecurity drive you inward, sapping the will to action.

arm_disability.Name: Arm Disability
arm_disability.Effect: At least one arm is either chronically or permanently nonfunctional.

blind.Name: Blind
P:
blind.Effect: You've lost or can't exercise your sense of sight.

chronic_agony.Name: Chronic Agony
chronic_agony.Effect: You're vulnerable to incapacitating pain spells.

chronic_sickness.Name: Chronic Sickness
chronic_sickness.Effect: Sickness or poison lingers in you, aggravated by stress.

disabled.Name: Disabled
P:
disabled.Effect: You can't effectively walk on your own power.

drained.Name: Drained
drained.Effect: You're weak and woozy from blood loss.

easy_prey.Name: Easy Prey
easy_prey.Effect: You've left a strong trail for a hunter to follow and exploit.

exhausted.Name: Exhausted
exhausted.Effect: You're run ragged on the edge of unconsciousness.

fatigued.Name: Fatigued
fatigued.Effect: You've pushed yourself too far, and your fatigue hangs over you constantly.

fragile.Name: Fragile
fragile.Effect: You're using equipment not sturdy enough to endure continued use.

intoxicated.Name: Intoxicated
intoxicated.Effect: Your discretion is dulled by altered consciousness.

invisible_predator.Name: Invisible Predator
invisible_predator.Effect: You've skulked on the hunt, leaving nary a trace of your approach.

leg_disability.Name: Leg Disability
leg_disability.Effect: At least one leg is either chronically or permanently nonfunctional.

lethargic.Name: Lethargic
lethargic.Effect: Fatigue tires you so heavily you cannot muster Willpower.

mute.Name: Mute
P:
mute.Effect: You cannot speak or use your voice.

numb.Name: Numb
numb.Effect: Detachment from the world dulls the feeling in your body.

recovery.Name: Recovery
recovery.Effect: The pain and weakness of breaking a heavy chemical dependency.

scarred.Name: Scarred
scarred.Effect: You're rattled and volatile from a sudden assault.

sickly.Name: Sickly
sickly.Effect: Disease is making its way through your system.

stumbled.Name: Stumbled
stumbled.Effect: A complication has arisen to interrupt an ongoing project.

untraceable.Name: Untraceable
untraceable.Effect: You've thoroughly covered any trail a hunter might use to find you.

volatile.Name: Volatile
volatile.Effect: You're using unstable equipment prone to backfiring.

bonded.Name: Bonded
bonded.Effect: You've established trust with a particular animal.

connected.Name: Connected
P:
connected.Effect: You've made inroads with a particular group of people.

embarrassing_secret.Name: Embarrassing Secret
embarrassing_secret.Effect: There are skeletons in your closet to exploit.

leveraged.Name: Leveraged
leveraged.Effect: A particular character is holding something over your head to compel you.

notoriety.Name: Notoriety
notoriety.Effect: Odious blame follows you, whether true or not.

tasked.Name: Tasked
tasked.Effect: Your duty-bound allies have issued you a serious task you must carry out.

watched.Name: Watched
watched.Effect: Someone is stalking you, suspicious of an unnatural secret you hide.
